turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello I will like to order a Caramel Macchiato

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which store will you like to place your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: : 2610 S Semoran Blvd Suite 101, Orlando, FL 32822

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, what size will you like your beverage?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will like a Grande please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What type of milk can we add for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Almond please!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Any honey or whipped cream

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, honey and whipped cream would be awesome.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great and who will this order be for?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: John

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, John, I've just place that order for you, it should be ready shortly.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks, I'm on my way,

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I've also send your receipt & order info to your mobile device.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just saw it

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, your order should be ready by time you're here.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Looking for to it, thank you

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Look forward to seeing you soon John.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thank You John.
